## Set up
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")


## Problem 1

### Data Plots

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

ggplot (data = penguins, aes(x=bill_length_mm, y= flipper_length_mm, color = species)) +
  geom_point()

ggsave("scatter_plot.pdf", height = 4, width = 6)
```
### Description of Penguins Data Set

The data set has `r nrow(penguins)` number of rows and  `r ncol(penguins)` number of columns. The mean flipper size is `r mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)`.
